nodes.text: The Tromper Crags mineral mine was a mineral mine located underneath the western mountains of the Highmount Ridge on the planet Hoth. The White Maw pirates controlled the mine, along with the rest of the neighboring Tromper Crags Geothermal Plant.
The Tromper Crags mineral mine appears as part of the Highmount Ridge on Hoth in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
